name: THE FANGS HUNTRESS
description:
Transylvania, 20XX. A sinister fog has enveloped the planet, with the powerful vampire Vladislav emerging from the fog. Bloodthirsty creatures of the night have risen. Cities have been turned to cemeteries, and the cemeteries are now settlements for the forces of the undead!

Game features:
- old school pixel art graphics;
- more than 35 types of monsters inspired by myths, folklore and horror films;
- 6 types of unique weapons: a stake, crossbow, revolver with silver bullets, double-barreled shotgun, nail gun and assault rifle;
- more than 11 levels: the crypt, sewer, factory, castle, city, opera and others;
- a lots of secrets;
- cool ambient music;
- journey to neo-gothic Transylvania =)
